column2:
"You can't have a great party without great food.
And you can't have great food without just the right
ingredients, and that includes the right seasonings."

"So that's why I want some
stimulating spices suitable for the party!"

"You know those Agnises you caught on video
when I had you go to Naberius?"

"If I boil their talons, I've heard
they'll make some good spices!"

"So, please!
Would you get me some of
Agnis' talons?!"
